title: Market Capitalization and Valuation Metrics of Radware Ltd

content.text: Radware Ltd has a market capitalization of $1.4 billion.
Here are some relevant valuation ratios for Radware Ltd:
Radware Ltd has a P/E ratio of 40.2, which indicates that investors are willing to pay 40.2 times the company's earnings.
The P/S ratio for Radware Ltd is 3.7, suggesting that investors are paying $3.7 for every $1 of the company's sales.
The P/B ratio for Radware Ltd is 3.1, indicating that investors are valuing the company at 3.1 times its book value.
Radware Ltd does not currently pay dividends, so it does not have a dividend yield.
To compare Radware Ltd's market capitalization and valuation metrics to industry benchmarks, further data on the industry is required.

Radware Ltd has a significant market capitalization of $1.4 billion. Its valuation ratios indicate that investors are willing to pay a premium for the company's earnings, sales, and book value. Further analysis is needed to compare these metrics to industry benchmarks.

news.headline: Skyhawk Security Harnesses AI to Launch, Automated Cloud Native CTEM Solution
news.summary: SAN FRANCISCO, May 01, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- RSA CONFERENCE – Skyhawk Security, the originator of cloud threat detection and response (CDR), today unveils its groundbreaking cloud native Continuous Threat Exposure Management (CTEM) solution. The agentless approach empowers organizations to automate their CTEM program for the first time and operationalize it through Skyhawk’s existing AI-based Synthesis Security Platform.
